title: Jack O' Lion
description:
A cranky lion gets a second chance at love.   
Trick or rawr?A young, drunken Jack plays a prank on the town's witch only to get caught. One curse later and he's stuck in the house he tricked, literally, unable to leave.Woe is the lion.Decades later, he's still a prisoner and a cranky one. His attitude isn't improved when a freak accident forces him to rely on a nurse while he heals.Harper doesn't believe in magic, so when she's asked to help out a recluse, she's determined to get to the root of his agoraphobia. Only it turns out he's not lying. Jack really is under a spell and this curious cat can't help but poke at it.Is love the trick to break the curse?
author: Eve Langlais
